page.title: 20Alstonefield Credits
page.content: The following pupils of Warslow Middle School prepared the information for this Domesday Block containing the village of Alstonefield. Only 6 of the children live in or near Alstonefield, some live some distance away to the north around the village of Flash. Karen Fearn (Sheen) Rachael Gould (Sheen) Richard Griffiths (Alstonefield) Mark Hambleton (Alstonefield) Alan Hayes (Alstonefield) Wendy Hayes (Alstonefield) Derek Heath (Knotbury) Belinda Lane (Alstonefield) Sandra Mycock (Alstonefield) Tracey Slack (Brund) Matthew Southam (Quarnford) Susan Thompson (Sheen) Andrew Wilkinson (Flash) Sarah Woolley (Sheen) Staff - Hazel Collett & Joe Gallagher.
